Class AbstractDeck<T extends AbstractCard>

java.lang.Object
games.GameObject
decks.AbstractDeck<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Class that extends AbstractCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardDeck, UnoDeck
public abstract class AbstractDeck<T extends AbstractCard> extends games.GameObject
Class that represents a basic deck. Each new deck class should extend this class. This deck can hold a specified number of cards, shuffle those cards, and get information about the deck

  • Field Details

    • capacity

      public final int capacity

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractDeck

      public AbstractDeck(int capacity)
      Initializes an empty deck with capacity capacity. The subclass constructor is responsible for adding cards.
      Parameters:
      capacity - capacity of the deck. This cannot be changed after construction.

  • Method Details

    • shuffle

      public final void shuffle()
      Randomly shuffles all cards in deck. This method clears and adds all cards from the Deque each method call.

    • drawCard

      public final T drawCard()
      Draws the top card of the deck.
      Returns:
      Top card of the deck.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If deck is empty.

    • addCard

      public final void addCard(T card)
      Adds card to the top of the deck. Deck should be shuffled after card is added if randomness is desired.
      Parameters:
      card - Card to be added to the deck.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If deck is at capacity.

    • getCardCount

      public final int getCardCount()
      Gets the amount of cards currently in the deck. This is not the capacity.
      Returns:
      Current amount of cards in the deck

    • isEmpty

      public final boolean isEmpty()
      Method to check if the deck is empty or not.
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty, false if not.

    • distributeDeck

      @SafeVarargs public final <P extends AbstractPlayer<T>> void distributeDeck(int numCards, P... ps)
      Method to distribute the deck to a variable number of players.
      Parameters:
      numCards - number of cards to distribute to each player
      ps - list of players
